Description: Gold quatrefoil leaf-shaped drop bead or pendant topped by a loop where is attached a chain of two folded eight-shaped links.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Tell Dafana, From the desert surface around the site.
Curator's comments: One of gold "pieces of chain" mentioned by W.M.F. Petrie, Tanis ii, Nebesheh and Defenneh, p. 76 § 73, "piece of gold chain with pendant", ibid., p. 110.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1888 / Tanis. Part II. Nebesheh (Am) and Defenneh (Tahpanhes) (p. 76 § 73, p. 110, pl. xli, 25)
Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.83, p.186, pl.28)
